item.title: Automated Value Investing Tool
item.description:
Project Overview

Value Investing Dashboard is a self-hosted financial analysis platform designed to automate fundamental stock research. Built on a hybrid Python/Rust architecture and containerized with Docker, it orchestrates data ingestion from Yahoo Finance and SEC EDGAR. The system features a Streamlit interface for interactive valuation (DCF, Piotroski F-Score) and integrates Google Gemini AI to generate comprehensive, Buffett-style investment theses and sentiment analysis.

The Goal: Build a fully automated pipeline to screen 500+ stocks daily.
